embeddedItem.name: Silvermane Badge
embeddedItem.desc: Pin badge worn by soldiers of the Silvermane Guards. Crude material used for enhancement.
embeddedItem.lore:
It is full of scratches from the erosion of wind and snow.

"In ancient times, there was only one way Silvermane Guards could retire: death."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

39351.name: Nowhere to Run
39351.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
39351.lore:
This isn't the first time he's seen this man.
This man had become his own inseparable shadow.
No matter how many times he runs this man through with his spear, the man always comes back.

He can neither lose to this man, nor truly win.
Though he wants to run away, there is nowhere to run.

79824.name: Moment of Victory
79824.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Preservation. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79824.lore:
"If you want to cry after your loss, Gepard, then cry."
"But you need to stand back up even when you are crying, until you can defeat me... Even if it takes years."
A few years later, the boy no longer cried or lost to his sister.

Now on the battle field, the courageous Silvermane Guard captain will defend till the end no matter what
— all to find the moment to completely destroy the enemy.

79825.name: In the Name of the World
79825.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79825.lore:
"Welt...?"
"It's a... great name, right?"
"Then..."
"From now on, you are Welt."
"This Herrscher core... and the mission to protect the world..."
"I'll leave them to you, Welt."

79826.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
79826.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Harmony. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79826.lore:
"Remember, the war with the monsters cannot be won by retreating."
"We are the last defense, the final iron wall between them and Belobog..."
"We cannot retreat under any circumstances!"

She looks up to see the frozen earth and endless winter ahead.
Business as usual.
Only that... the figure at which she had been gazing is gone.

337981.name: Bronya
337981.lore:
Heir apparent to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog.
She possesses pride befitting of a princess, but also the determination and integrity of a soldier.

538567.name: Serval
538567.lore:
A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects.
As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's.
She loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

549408.name: Ancient Part
549408.desc: Mechanical part left behind from the Old World. Crude material used for enhancement.
549408.lore:
Despite its size, it was cast and polished in a way that people today would struggle to replicate.

"A small screw in the Old World is stronger than our armor."

549437.name: Thief's Instinct
549437.desc: A small amount of anti-matter. Crude material used for enhancement.
549437.lore:
A small amount of anti-matter that emanates out of the Voidranger: Reaver like the materialization of its destructive instinct.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."

549438.name: Extinguished Core
549438.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
549438.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster.

"Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: one half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro

549503.name: Artifex's Module
549503.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Crude material used for enhancement.
549503.lore:
The foundation of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The smallest constituent of all machine parts. Breaking it apart would be akin to destroying the cellular structure of a living being.

"The Intelligentsia Guild put up a bounty of two million credits for technical plans that can flawlessly disassemble Xianzhou mechanical puppets."
"If you know Screwllum, then these two millions are basically yours to take..."

549504.name: Immortal Scionette
549504.desc: New and young shoot budding from an ancient divine construct. Crude material used for enhancement.
549504.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. Countless years ago, a sovereign's hubris for immortality caused the Xianzhou fleet to sail into the sea of outer space to seek divine recipes.

"We desire to live for endless ages and maintain the empire for all eternity. Unfortunately, human lives have limits and human capacity has its ends. Thus, we send nine Navium Astriger to sail beyond the sky, seeking divine recipes for immortality."

676261.name: Mutual Demise
676261.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676261.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"How does one make perfect the past of a planet? Now — immediately — rend the planet asunder."

676265.name: Meshing Cogs
676265.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Harmony. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676265.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Harmony is achieved when everyone does their bit amidst the clunking of machines."

754823.name: Memories of the Past
754823.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Harmony. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754823.lore:
An old photo lies on the far end of the table in the guardian's residence.
She would always subconsciously move her eyes away whenever she happened to see it.
The memories of the past had already become distant, but the dreams of today still linger.

754824.name: Only Silence Remains
754824.desc: Light Cone for the Path of The Hunt. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754824.lore:
"Shouldn't we get off? It's our stop."
A chuckle came from above. His eyes moved, but he didn't look up.

"To be clear, March always says you're expressionless, but I don't agree."
"The train's data bank show traces of an update, but the results weren't saved."
"So... which entry were you having trouble with?"

He grasped his pen tighter as he looked at the bloody scene drawn in the notebook from memory.

"I see. It was the one about you..."

754826.name: Good Night and Sleep Well
754826.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754826.lore:
The dim light outlines the dust tracks,
As a young girl mumbles sweetly in her sleep.
A silent figure appears behind her.
"Well, well, well, you're cuter without those glasses — I knew it."
The guitarist stares at her sleeping face, muttering to herself:
"Good night, the genius girl that worries a lot."

792905.name: Darting Arrow
792905.desc: Light Cone for the Path of The Hunt. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792905.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"The battle has begun. Arrows are thirsty for blood."

792907.name: Chorus
792907.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Harmony. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792907.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Fingers clutch to make a fist, strength is built via numbers. I give myself for something higher — the concept of us."

792911.name: Cornucopia
792911.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Abundance. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792911.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Life is the existence of order beyond a certain threshold. Its birth is the final answer to the silent universe, declaring the end to the era of old chaos."

838766.name: A Secret Vow
838766.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838766.lore:
The boy would always make sure that his gloves and elbow guards were in good shape before leaving.
He treasured his gloves more than anything because they were tight enough to hide secrets.
With this layer of protection, no one could see the bandages on his hand and the wound beneath them.
He would be treated as if he was normal, and he would be greeted just like everyone else.

That was all he asked for.

885572.name: Gepard
885572.lore:
A captain in the Silvermane Guards and an outstanding warrior of Belobog.
He is meticulous and vigilant to the core and is always true to himself.

890953.name: Welt
890953.lore:
A seasoned member of the Express Crew.
The passion buried in his heart burns anew as he enjoys this fresh adventure.
Occasionally, he would sketch the experiences in a notebook.

945120.name: Asta
945120.lore:
The lead researcher of Herta Space Station and a lady from a renowned family.
She's an astronomer overflowing with curiosity, and excels at managing the disparate staff of the space station.

955411.name: Fermata
955411.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955411.lore:
The phonograph record is being played, spinning nonstop. Even the sounds of all those hoarse shrieks cannot escape the heatwave and are dampened by its tepidity.
She seemed unprepared and utterly enthralled by the fascinating melodies:

It started with sincerity and anticipation...
...followed by a passionate catharsis...
...with one climax after another...

...until the record's spinning came to a final stop and those hoarse shrieks were no longer audible.
"Mission accomplished."

955412.name: Quid Pro Quo
955412.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Abundance. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955412.lore:
After enjoying an intense massage from the dragon girl,
the Foxian girl held out her hand and playfully pinched the dragon girl's little chubby cheeks.
The little girl then pouted her lips, clearly offended, only to elicit a gleeful giggle from the Foxian girl.

"Now that's what I call a proper quid pro quo."
